statements: SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT message_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY sender_id ASC, receiver_id DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp, player_id FROM chat_messages;
SELECT flag_id, message_id, flag_reason, flag_timestamp FROM flagged_messages;
SELECT player_id, message_text, timestamp, message_id FROM chat_messages;
SELECT moderator_id, flag_reason, flag_id, flag_timestamp FROM flagged_messages;
SELECT message_text, timestamp, message_id, player_id FROM chat_messages;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, player_id FROM chat_messages WHERE message_id = 456;
SELECT flag_reason, moderator_id FROM flagged_messages WHERE flag_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE player_id = 789 AND message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT message_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages JOIN flagged_messages ON chat_messages.message_id = flagged_messages.message_id;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '1'
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '2' ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '3' ORDER BY message_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%'
SELECT * FROM chat_messages ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY message_timestamp ASC
SELECT message_id, message_text, message_timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND receiver_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR receiver_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY message_count DESC
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM message ORDER BY message_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM moderation_log WHERE action = 'delete' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM message INNER JOIN player ON message.player_id = player.player_id WHERE message_id > 10 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_name, message_text, timestamp FROM player JOIN message ON player.player_id = message.player_id INNER JOIN moderation_log ON message.message_id = moderation_log.message_id;
SELECT moderator_name, action, timestamp FROM moderator JOIN moderation_log ON moderator.moderator_id = moderation_log.moderator_id WHERE action = 'delete' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages;
SELECT message_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 'abc123' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND timestamp >= '2022-12-31 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT report_reason, report_date FROM reported_messages WHERE reported_by = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT action_description FROM moderation_actions WHERE moderator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
